name: css-line-height
description: Css module of single purpose classes for line height

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-line-height.css > css/css-line-height.css && tachyons src/css-line-height.css --minify > css/css-line-height.min.css && tachyons src/css-line-height.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
